definition[0]: covering or affecting all parts of something equally
example[0]: Make sure the surface is evenly covered with paint.
example[1]: Spread the butter evenly over the toast.
example[2]: Support for the Liberals is fairly evenly spread across the country.
example[3]: Make sure the weight is evenly distributed.
example[4]: The profits will be split evenly between the three of us.
example[5]: Government ministers are fairly evenly divided on this issue.
example[6]: The prospects for the country are fairly evenly balanced between peaceful reform and revolution.
definition[2]: in a regular or steady way
example[7]: He was breathing more evenly now.
definition[3]: if you say something evenly, you say it in a calm way without getting angry or upset
